channel.title: Fading Hitmakrs Problem
channel.description:
So i followed a tutorial on Fading hitmarks from Asshole_rule and it doesnt Show the hits or drain my HP bar. Also it shows double hit or block: I followed it all fine i think...
MEDIA: [URL=http://www.imagebam.com/image/2731b3234119519][IMG]http://thumbnails103.imagebam.com/23412/2731b3234119519.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Fading Hitmakrs Problem
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

asshole_rule:

you commented that out and expect not to get a bug?

I got HP bars working now the only thing is when i hit with magic it just gives the attack icon :o
and with ranged it doesnt give any icon lol.
Damn i think i fucked it all up…
Ima redo the Tutorial thanks for the help so far.

Read full topic

item.title: Fading Hitmakrs Problem
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:3, topic:479950”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=598186.msg4208305#msg4208305 date=1359227261]
you probably packed the fonts wrong, and you’re calling the hit mask twice.

the hp bar is cause you loveed something up client sided when adding.
[/quote]
Thanks, so how do i pack those Fonts right?
and i really can’t find anything related to the HP bars :([/quote]

I’ve posted fixes or tips to all those bugs on the thread somewhere

Read full topic
